data.title: Wipro Limited
data.meta_description: Wipro Limited is a global leader in information technology, consulting and business process services. Read more.....
data.text:
In June 2024, Wipro Limited has partnered with Zscaler to launch Wipro Cyber X-Ray, an AI-assisted platform that helps enterprise CXOs make optimal security investment decisions and communicate cyber values to senior leadership and the board.

In March 2024, Wipro expanded partnership with Nutanix to launch a new Nutanix business unit.

In February 2024, Wipro Limited announced that it has completed the migration of ManpowerGroup's largest data centre in Europe to Microsoft Azure.

In February 2024, Wipro announced a joint private wireless solution with Nokia (NYSE: NOK), to help enterprises scale their digital transformation.

In February 2024, Wipro announced an expanded collaboration with Intel Foundry to accelerate chip design innovation. As the key Design Services and Alliance Partner, Wipro will work with Intel Foundry to accelerate the development of Intel’s most advanced process nodes, including the Intel18A process node.

In November 2023, Wipro Limited announced that it is working with Amazon Web Services (AWS) to redefine the future of lab processes in the life sciences industry.

In November 2023, Wipro Limited announced a collaboration with NVIDIA to help healthcare companies accelerate adoption of generative artificial intelligence (gen AI) through AI-driven strategies, products, and services.

In August 2023, Wipro Limited announced the launch of a digital skills credentialing and verification initiative in India.

In August 2023, Wipro Limited announced the launch of a new Centre of Excellence on Generative Artificial Intelligence (AI) in partnership with the prestigious Indian Institute of Technology (IIT) Delhi.

In July 2023, Wipro announced the launch of Wipro ai360, a comprehensive, AI-first innovation ecosystem that builds on Wipro’s decade-long investments in artificial intelligence (AI) with the goal of integrating AI into every platform, every tool, and every solution used internally and offered to clients.

In June 2023, Wipro announced that it has been recognized as one of India’s Best Companies to Work For 2023–Top 100, by Great Place to Work India, for the second year in a row.

Wipro Expands Google Cloud Partnership to Advance Enterprise Adoption of Generative AI

In March 2023, Wipro announced the launch of its “5G Def-i” platform. The integrated platform empowers businesses to seamlessly transform their infrastructure, networks and services.

In November 2022, at AWS re:Invent 2022, Wipro Limited announced the beginning of their new Skills Guild with Amazon Web Services (AWS). The AWS Skills Guild framework will be used by Wipro Step Up to change how employees interact with clients during their AWS Cloud journeys.

Wipro and Pandorum Solutions, a Bengaluru-based biotechnology firm, announced a long-term collaboration to create technologies that would shorten time-to-market and improve patient outcomes in regenerative medicine R&D and clinical trials.

Wipro has been awarded a five-year, strategic engagement deal worth US$ 150 million to drive transformation for ABB’s Information Systems digital workplace services.

In September 2021, Wipro announced the launch of its Wipro-Google Cloud Innovation Arena in Bangalore, India.

In September 2021, Wipro signed a multiyear agreement with Maxis Broadband Sdn Bhd, Kuala Lumpur-based converged solutions provider, to offer various IT services.

In August 2021, the company collaborated with DataRobot, a provider of augmented intelligence services, to deliver scalable enterprise AI solutions to customers.

In August 2021, it announced the Wipro AWS Launch Pad co-innovation centre in São Paulo to deliver enhanced cloud solutions.

In July 2021, Wipro introduced FieldX, a cloud-based end-to-end digital service lifecycle automation solution, to provide advanced customer service operations to its clients.

In June 2021, Wipro announced that it has joined the World Economic Forum’s ‘Partnership for New Work Standards’ initiative to establish a healthy, resilient and equitable future of work.

In May 2021, Wipro announced a partnership with Transcell Oncologics to transform vaccine safety assessment using augmented intelligence (AI).

In April 2021, Wipro announced the implementation of a digital experience platform for Bristol Water to modernise critical infrastructure.

In April 2021, Wipro signed an agreement to acquire Ampion, an Australia-based provider of quality engineering services, cyber security and DevOps.

In December 2020, Wipro collaborated with Verifone for a multiyear contract to drive agility across its (Verifone) cloud service offerings.

In November 2020, Wipro has been selected as a member of the global Dow Jones Sustainability World Index (DJSI) – 2020 for the eleventh year in succession.

In November 20020, Wipro and SNP Schneider-Neureither & Partner SE announced a strategic partnership to help customers accelerate their enterprise transformation.

In November 2020, Wipro partnered with Cisco to deliver managed software-defined wide area network (SD-WAN) transformation services to Olympus, a medical devices and systems company headquartered in Tokyo, Japan

Wipro plans to set up a digital innovation hub in Dusseldorf, Germany, to serve as the IT services major flagship centre in Europe

Wipro to provide engineering services support for commercialising solutions on Intel's OpenNESS toolkit

Wipro partnered with IBM to offer Cloud solutions

Acquired Rational Interaction, a full-service digital customer experience (CX) company in Washington
